long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LinkedLuv is an innovative Chrome plugin that enhances your LinkedIn experience by integrating dating features within a professional environment. Display your marital status and manage your personal connections seamlessly while maintaining your professional image. With LinkedLuv, you can confidently explore meaningful relationships alongside your career aspirations. Join us in bridging the gap between professional networking and personal connections.
